entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • References to Ubuntu 14.04 can be deleted #61754
  • FileExtensionAttributeAdapter Fails jQuery Validation #61753
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #61752
  • ::deep pseudo-element does not work if child component is not wrapped into a 'super' tag by parent component #61750
  • Blazor WASM, Web App(Auto,WASM) Repeatedly Re-renders in Debug Mode When Using WebAssembly.instantiateStreaming via Web Worker #61749
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-noop, json #61746

Closed

  • Button click not Working #61751
  • Fix validations generator handling for parsable types #61525
  • Perf regression: updates #61747
  • Add loading of [ApplicationName].settings.json & [ApplicationName].settings.[EnvironmentName].json to default WebHost #61343

PullRequests

Created

  • Update helix references #61755
    area-infrastructure
  • Update `ResourceCollectionProvider` to take advantage of Declarative persistent component state #61748
    area-blazor
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #61745
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Fix handling of parsable types in validations generator #61728
    area-minimal, feature-validation, 10.0-preview5

Updated

  • Blazor - rendering metrics and tracing #61609
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview5
  • Swap out Win11 for Win-VS2022 in CI #61743
    area-infrastructure
  • feat: support tls client hello bytes callback in Kestrel #61631
    area-networking
  • Follow-up: Improve stopping renderer, fix identity template #61633
    area-blazor, feature-prerendering, feature-blazor-navigation, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Remove the check for `cacheBootResources` from Auto render mode detection #61666
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview5

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Programmatic Scaffold-Migration Broken After Updating from 8.0.15 to 9.0.4 #36016
  • Using nested owned types causes InvalidOperationException #36015
  • Unnecessary CAST on bigint column type when is used in inequality #36014

Closed

  • Support multiple HasQueryFilter calls on same entity type #10275
  • Clarification Request: AutoInclude Behavior for Nested Navigation Properties in EF Core #36010

PullRequests

Merged

  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #36013

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting `Shell.CurrentItem` reorders items in flyout menu #29272
  • Setting ContentPage background to transparent doesn't work correctly when shown with PushModalAsync() on Windows #29269
  • Defining AndroidHttpClientHandlerType and using Central Package Management fails #29267
  • Investigate/implement localization of obsolete messages in .NET MAUI SDK #29266
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Rotating the My Recipe page would cause the page to automatically switch selection to the 2nd item. #29264
  • MAUI: default mail app in IOS is not open... #29262
  • CarouselViewHandler2 for iOS doesn't properly bounce back when reaching the end with Loop=false #29261
  • Make DispatcherExtensions with DispatchIfRequired() and FindDispatcher() available #29258
    .NET 10 Planning
  • iOS Share.Default.RequestAsync does not display UIActivityViewController #29257

Closed

  • Shell FlyoutItems disappear when left ALT key is pressed (Windows). #25046
  • Create cgmanifest.json file #27717
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • Does Maui Support NativeAOT Now? #29263

PullRequests

Created

  • [net10.0] Merge main net10 #29273
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [ci] Update internal release pipeline to push nuget #29271
  • Fix for First Item in CollectionView Overlaps in FlyoutPage.Flyout on iOS #29265
    area-controls-flyoutpage, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Expose DispatcherExtensions so it could be used outside of Maui as well #29259
    community ✨

Merged

  • [ci] Add cgmanifest word to cSpell #29270
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Upgrade `Microsoft.Graphics.Win2D` from `1.2.0` to `1.3.2` to fix a build warning #28885
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨
  • [ci] Remove old Mono.ToolChain #29268
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [sfi] Add cgmanifest.json #29244
    area-sfi, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 9 #29248
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [ci] Update AspNet.Security.OAuth.Apple #29250
    area-infrastructure, area-sfi, .NET 9 SR7
  • Obsolete UseMauiCompatibility for .NET 10 #29021
    t/breaking 💥, area-compatibility, .NET 10.0-preview4

Updated

    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Windows] Remove workarounds from `WinUI.targets` #29256
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, .NET 9 SR7
  • [2025/05/03] Staging - In Flight Branch #28486
    area-infrastructure, .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background - Fix #28522
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-modal, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Android] Fix: Modal Animation Repeats When Returning from Background #28538
    platform/android 🤖, area-core-lifecycle, community ✨, area-controls-modal, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Add Accessibility Selected for Android and iOS CollectionView #29014
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, t/a11y, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR7
  • [iOS] NavigationBarHiddenAnimation - iOS specifics #29220
    proposal/open, area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview5
  • Add the ability to intercept all web resource requests #28876
    area-controls-webview, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] - Fix KeepScrollOffset Behavior During Dynamic Item Additions in CollectionView #29255
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Cleanup of `AccessibilityExtensions` #27052
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-general, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR7
  • Fixed Incorrect Window.Y and Window.Height values when closing a maximized window #29253
    community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fixed Setting a Label visible after having had focus on a InputView will increase the Label's height #29210
    p/0, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Fix CarouselView EmptyView display when filtering to zero items #29247

  • Fixes footer position not updated on CV1 when clearing all items #29173

    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing
  • Fixed the OnPlatform does not work for header property in Collection view #28935
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IDE0040 CodeFix with omit_if_default remove `fixed` keyword from field. #78395
  • Remove ValueTuple workaround from FunctionResolver #78392
  • dotnet_sort_system_directives_first and dotnet_separate_import_directive_groups (IDE0055) don't generate warnings #78391
  • Intellisense information on generic extension method doesn't help for type arguments #78387
  • Assert in nullable state tracking #78386

Closed

  • EnC: implement support for field keyword in property accessors #77951
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-10529.74 #78383

PullRequests

Created

  • Additional tests to complete the test plan #78396
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature-UserDefinedCompoundAssignmentOperators
  • A bit of cleanup to StopWatchingReference's code to help diagnose an issue #78394
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Revert "Move Range and Index to Contracts source package (#78371)" #78390
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Extensions package #78388
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Extract base LanguageServerProjectLoader from LanguageServerProjectSystem #78329
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Implement workaround for missing ValueTuple in remote debugger #78393
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • Remove suppression and fix VSTHRD100 #78373
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Edit & Continue support for field access in auto-properties #78289
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Removed PROTOTYPE comments in features/UserDefinedCompoundAssignment #78389
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Extensions: xml docs #78365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Allow declaring operators in extension blocks #78385
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Move ICollectionExtensions to MS.CA.Collections #78384
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Allow Razor cohosting to hook into configuration change notifications #78364
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Move more collections and collection related extensions to MS.CA.Collections source package #78379
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Move runtime async method validation into initial binding #78310
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Runtime Async
  • File based programs IDE support #78208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • Switch to microbuild to publish PR val build symbols #77088
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reduce duplicated FileUtilities.GetFileTimeStamp calls #78321
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: extend support for key-value pairs to non-dictionary collections of `KeyValuePair<K, V>` #78274
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add code for analzying copilot changes. #78353
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Delete copy of System.IO.Hashing sources #78357
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move test helpers to NetLatest #78082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add support for FieldRva to EnC delta #78033
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode, Feature - String Literals in Data Section as UTF8
  • PooledObjects cleanup #78382
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Unify roslyn analyzers on single version #78381
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • On-the-fly-docs -- Add better testing and provide more context for more cases #78148
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Disable nuget warning new in net10 as is likely false positives for roslyn #78380
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Extensions: analyzer actions #78319
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Precursor work to merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures. #78308
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload does not work on iOS when running from Mac #115208
  • Support for marshalling optional parameters in `[GeneratedComInterface]` interfaces #115205
    Future
  • [mono][aot] aot compiler crash #115203
    10.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'tree->IsUnusedValue()' in 'Program:M0()' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #115202
    10.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add TensorPool<T> #115201
  • [API Proposal]: Add a fluent `OptionsBuilder` method that adds validator types #115200
    Future
  • Missed constant folding for some bitwise operations #115199
  • IHostedService.StopAsync not invoked with `8.0-windowsservercore-ltsc2019` image #115206
  • [mono] MONO_THREADS_SUSPEND preemptive hit asset #115185
  • [mono] Time-outs on Linux FullAOT Mono runtime tests CI #115183
  • Transient NullReferenceException when calling HttpClient.GetAsync #115179
  • Mono: ManualResetEventSlim.Wait() unexpectedly returns without blocking #115178
  • Test failure: System.CodeDom.Compiler.Tests.ExecutorTests.ExecWaitWithCapture_OutputIncludesCurrentDirectory #115175
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/Mvn/Mvn.cmd #115174

Closed

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'm_dfsTree != nullptr' #115168
    10.0.0
  • [APX] Get ThreadContext for APX extended registers #112757
    10.0.0
  • Fuzzlyn windows-x86 pipeline often times out some partitions #115171
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 4 Regressions on 10/27/2024 3:01:56 PM #109347
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 13 Regressions on 1/23/2025 10:40:01 PM +00:00 #111913
    10.0.0
  • Missing Valencian language #115180
  • [API Proposal]: DbDataReader - span based column name APIs #113741
  • [API Proposal]: System.ClientModel Open Telemetry extension APIs #114084
  • `CultureNotFoundException` thrown when a keyboard with language tag `und` is activated #98543
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Wrapper around a float generates additional asm compared to float #115193
  • [Perf][Mono] Speed regression in Buffer.BlockCopy across all Mono AOT and WASM configurations on 3/24/2025 4:04:18 PM +00:00 #114696
  • Project with spaces (or other characters) doesn't build with NativeAOT on Android #115165
  • Arm64: !"Inconsistent profile data" Remove empty try-catch-fault 3 #115122
    10.0.0
  • Unfamiliar crash in prod environmnet c0000005 #114144
  • Native AOT: Re-order method bodies using PGO data #114093
    10.0.0
  • [QUIC] IsSupportedIsTrue failing on s390x #82154
    Future
  • Disallow build warnings #6144
  • [Linux/ARM] SIGILL during stepping under managed debugger #10884
  • Avoid object layout mismatch between coreclr and mscordaccore by comparing them during the build. #12770
  • Managed Data Breakpoint counts can get out of sync due to mismatched addresses in ThreadContexts #13001

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace NET6_0 with NET #115209
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [cDAC] Implement 'no-op' ISOSDacInterface methods #115207
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable System.Runtime.Intrinsics/tests in wasm smoke tests #115204
    area-Build-mono
  • [clr-interp] Fix access of boxed static fields address #115198
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Fix empty LdapException.ServerErrorMessage #115192
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Swallow CryptographicExceptions when adding certificates to store #115190
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Allow access to connection info in certificate validation callback #115186
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Improve BigMul to fix Decimal compare regression #112432 #115182
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: escape analysis for delegates #115172
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Adding additional 8 eGPR. #113988
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx
  • JIT: Disallow flowgraph modifications during VN opts #115197
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Build host.native for native AOT libraries testing #114764
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update approved API in runtime-async spec #115181
    area-Meta, community-contribution, runtime-async
  • Add timeout to Fuzzlyn reductions #115189
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude --gcc-toolchain from cross arg #115163
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reformat TypePreinit.cs #115191
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove ReadyToRun prefix from image layout code #115188
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix alignment in diagram in comment in clrconfigvalues #115195
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup --whole-archive linking #115194
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix passing flags in single-file tests for NativeLibrary.TryLoad #115173
    area-Single-File, 10.0.0
  • [WinHTTP] Fix certificate caching timeout #115144
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix culture creation with undetermined lang tag #115166
    area-System.Globalization, 10.0.0
  • Increase timeout on fuzzing deployment pipeline #114535
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 10.0.0
  • Fix regression caused by overload resolution. #115164
    area-System.Buffers, 10.0.0
  • Suppress CredScan false positive in PfxTests.cs #115184
    area-System.Security
  • JIT: Decrease Gauss-Seidel stop residual #115150
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reuse crossgen2 logic to lay out methods using PGO data #114736
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [QUIC] Delete ActiveIssues on SupportedLinuxPlatforms_IsSupportedIsTrue test #115141
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Model partial defs less conservatively in liveness when possible #115081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Add runtime async transformation #114861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, runtime-async
  • [browser] Clean up Wasm.Build.Tests #114993
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #115176
    area-codeflow

Updated

  • [DRAFT] Write barrier without any RWX pages #114982
    area-VM-coreclr
  • GC Distribute Free list port from .NET 10 #115023
    area-GC-coreclr
  • backport free-list change to release/9.0-staging #115167
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use SDK ILLink analyzer for OOBs for downlevel TFMs #114983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Interpreter EH support in the runtime #114649
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr
  • [SME] Design proposal #115037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use Span<T>-based methods in System.Net.Mail #115111
    area-System.Net
  • Convert JIT_Box* to C# #115134
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [cDAC] Implement ISOSDacImpl.GetAssemblyList #114800
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement IXCLRDataProcess.EnumMethodInstancesByAddress #115131
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Implementation for `UnsafeAccessorTypeAttribute` #114881
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • Share implementation of ComWrappers between CoreCLR and NativeAOT #113907
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Add bootstrapping build mechanism and enable for SourceBuild #114285
    source-build, area-Infrastructure
  • [Android] Support static linking of CoreCLR on Android #114629
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0
  • ML-DSA+COSE #115158
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [Android] Run CoreCLR library tests on Android #114148
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-android, 10.0.0

  • Add PKCS#8, SPKI and PEM support for SLH-DSA #114943
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation

    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [wasm coreclr] Make clr.runtime+libs build on Windows #115058
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, Future
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Add WebSocketStream #114363
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation

    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

  • Add pattern matching for SVE intrinsics that operate on mask operands #114438

  • [browser] runtimeConfig via boot config #115113
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Use AssemblyLoadContext-aware caches in TypeDescriptor to support unloading of assemblies cached by TypeDescriptor #114619

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Deb and RPM generation sometimes happens before sdk layout #48785
  • 'dotnet tool install -g cake' results in System.IO.DirectoryNotFoundException #48781

Closed

  • dotnet restore app.cs #48551

PullRequests

Created

  • Add GitHub Action workflow to update man pages #48784
  • Support multiple files in file-based programs #48782
    Area-run-file

Merged

  • Exclude tests from binskim scanning #48756
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary CA2022 suppressions #48766
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Flow enablePoison parameter to VMR build #48780
  • Support build/restore of file-based programs #48662
    Area-run-file
  • Use LangVersion=Preview #48747
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Source code updates from dotnet/dotnet #48778
    Area-CodeFlow
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR

Updated

  • Unify the nullable reference type approaches #48776
    Area-CLI
  • Reduce specific test executions times #48405
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown
  • Add 9.0.3xx to the branch lockdown labeler #48774
  • Update multi-file 'dotnet run file' documentation #48437
    documentation, untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Add file-based program API for use by IDE #48749
    Area-run-file
  • sln-add: Refactor logic for autogenerating solution folders #48726
    Area-CLI
  • [WIP] `dotnet tool exec <package[@version]>` one-shot execution #48443
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Support RID-specific .NET Tool packages #48575
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Enable container test execution #48763
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Local dev props #48739
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #48775
  • Ignore .slnx #48729
    Servicing-consider, Branch Lockdown
